column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Rose - Thank you for your review and feedback. I'm disappointed to hear about your experience at our restaurant
column2: especially since you have visited us on other occasions. First allow me to address your service. I am currently investigating the mishandling of your seating. I believe the act of knocking over the server's tray of waters created a certain amount of discord that required immediate attention
column3: mostly because wet floors in any high-traffic establishment can be very dangerous.
